name: Apple Inc.
description: Minimal test fixture with 10 days of price data and recent news. Suitable for quick tests.

expected_output.rationale: Strong fundamentals with positive earnings beat, analyst upgrades, and good technical position. Services growth momentum strong. Some regulatory risk in EU partially offsets bullish signals.

validation_notes: Expected to generate BUY signal with moderate to high confidence. Suitable for both rule-based and LLM-powered analysis.
